name: Tale Of A Wolf
description:
EXPERIENCE THE LIFE OF A WOLF
You take control of a young wolf named Ako. Born on the island of Sylvanna, you have learned the ways of the world from your father. However, there is still much to learn. Ako, a naive canine discovers this abruptly as he meets mankind for the first time and sees their wicked ways for himself. You will have to survive the wildlands and reclaim the island to restore the natural balance of the diverse ecosytem on Sylvanna.

THE STORY IS YOURS TO TELL
Set in the beautiful isles of Sylvanna, the time of tranquility is over, man has landed on the shores and they are setting up camps all over the island. You can decide to stalk your human prey and take them down silently one by one. Or if you wish, use the power of fire to burn down the encampments sprawled across the land.

REALISTIC ENVIRONMENT
Tale Of A Wolf features a variety of realistic mechanics!
  • Day/Night with full seasonal weather.
  • Wild animals roam the land freely - Deers, Bears, Toads, Hedgehogs, Crab, Rabbit, Fox.
  • Open world 5km x 5km area to explore!
  • Wild wolf packs that you can either work with or against!
  • Extensive cave system, extending the walkable area.
  • Use the force of fire to elimanate your enemies or cause distractions!

GET READY FOR A NEW ADVENTURE
Will the humans takeover Sylvanna?

Will the native wildlife survive the expansion of mankind?

Guide Ako on his journey of discovery and make unconventional friendships along the way!
